attributes.action: Automatic “do not resuscitate” is wrong just because of learning disabilities!
attributes.additional_details:
People with learning disabilities comes in all forms and some are more intellectual than normal people and useful.  What if their disability just includes having to be shown another the way?  
The government are wrong and this should be debated and put through the courts!!
attributes.background:
The government is wrong in stating that every person that requires help from the NHS with learning disabilities should have a do not resuscitate order!
Who are you to pick who lives and dies?

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition we currently have open.

Hold a public inquiry into the use of DNACPR orders during the Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562740
